spec_data.Name: mplus-2m-fonts
spec_data.Description:
The combination of fixed-fullwidth M+ 2M for Japanese and fixed-halfwidth
M+ 2M Type-2 for alphabets. They are 5 weights from Thin to Bold.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 12:05:31 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: M+ M emphasize the balance of natural letterform and high legibility
